game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that a valuable artifact is concealed within an old ruin. Your quest is to find it and bring it back to the village elder.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You must explore the dense forest to the east until you find the hidden entrance to the ruins.
A powerful creature guards the artifact. You must defeat it before you can claim the artifact.
